meanings.definition: A spreadable mixture, typically of cream cheese and other ingredients, used on bread or bagels.
meanings.sent1: I love to put a shmear of cream cheese on my bagel in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She always adds a generous shmear of jam on her toast.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally stepped in the shmear of peanut butter on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully applied a colorful shmear of paint on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The bakery offers a delicious shmear of frosting on their cupcakes.

meanings.definition: To spread or smear a substance over a surface.
meanings.sent1: Please shmear the butter evenly on the toast.
meanings.sent2: He likes to shmear sunscreen on his skin before going to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to shmear mud on his friend's face during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly shmears sauce on the pizza dough before adding toppings.
meanings.sent5: She carefully shmears glue on the paper to attach the pieces together.
